datasetStructure: One record per test per observation time per subject

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.

datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: BWSEQ

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89962

modelClassVariable.title: Short Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWTESTCD

datasetVariables.description: Short name of the measurement, test, or examination described in BWTEST. It can be used as a column name when converting a dataset from a vertical to a horizontal format. The value in BWTESTCD cannot be longer than 8 characters, nor can it start with a number (e.g., "1TEST" is not valid). BWTESTCD cannot contain characters other than letters, numbers, or underscores.
datasetVariables.label: Test Short Name
datasetVariables.name: BWTESTCD

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C89961

modelClassVariable.title: Name of Measurement, Test or Examination

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWTEST

datasetVariables.description: Long name for BWTESTCD. The value in BWTEST cannot be longer than 40 characters.
datasetVariables.label: Test Name
datasetVariables.name: BWTEST

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWORRES

datasetVariables.description: Result of the measurement or finding as originally received or collected.
datasetVariables.label: Result or Findings as Collected
datasetVariables.name: BWORRES

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWORRESU

datasetVariables.description: The unit for the original result. The unit of the original result should be mapped to a synonymous unit on the Controlled Terminology list.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Original Result
datasetVariables.name: BWORRESU

modelClassVariable.title: Result or Finding in Standard Format

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWSTRESC

datasetVariables.description: Contains the result value for all findings, copied or derived from BWORRES in a standard format or standard units. BWSTRESC should store all results or findings in character format; if results are numeric, they should also be submitted in numeric format in BWSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Character Format
datasetVariables.name: BWSTRESC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWSTRESN

datasetVariables.description: Used for numeric results or findings in standard format; contains the numeric form of BWSTRESC. BWSTRESN should store all numeric test results or findings.
datasetVariables.label: Standardized Result in Numeric Format
datasetVariables.name: BWSTRESN

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWSTRESU

datasetVariables.description: Standardized unit used for BWSTRESC and BWSTRESN.
datasetVariables.label: Unit of the Standardized Result
datasetVariables.name: BWSTRESU

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66789

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWSTAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate when a test is not done or result is missing. Should be null if a result exists in BWORRES.
datasetVariables.label: Completion Status
datasetVariables.name: BWSTAT

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWREASND

datasetVariables.description: Describes why BWSTAT is NOT DONE, such as BROKEN EQUIPMENT or TECHNICIAN OVERSIGHT.
datasetVariables.label: Reason Not Done
datasetVariables.name: BWREASND

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWBLFL

datasetVariables.description: A baseline indicator may be used to calculate differences or changes from baseline. Value should be Y or null. The baseline flag is sponsor defined.
datasetVariables.label: Baseline Flag
datasetVariables.name: BWBLFL

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWFAST

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify fasting status. The value should by Y or null.
datasetVariables.label: Fasting Status
datasetVariables.name: BWFAST

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWEXCLFL

datasetVariables.description: Y if the result should be excluded from all calculations, otherwise null.
datasetVariables.label: Exclusion Flag
datasetVariables.name: BWEXCLFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWREASEX

datasetVariables.description: The reason the result should be excluded from all calculations. Used only when BWEXCLFL is Y.
datasetVariables.label: Reason for Exclusion
datasetVariables.name: BWREASEX

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWUSCHFL

datasetVariables.description: Indicates whether the timing of a performed test or observation was unscheduled. If a test or observation was performed based upon a schedule defined in the protocol, this flag should be null. Expected values are Y or null.
datasetVariables.label: Unscheduled Flag
datasetVariables.name: BWUSCHFL

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.VISITDY

datasetVariables.description: Planned study day of collection. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Planned Study Day of Collection
datasetVariables.name: VISITDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWDTC

datasetVariables.description: Date/Time of body weight collection in ISO 8601 format.
datasetVariables.label: Date/Time Animal Weighed
datasetVariables.name: BWDTC

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWDY

datasetVariables.description: Study day of body weight collection, in integer days. The algorithm for calculations must be relative to the sponsor-defined RFSTDTC variable in the Demographics (DM) domain.
datasetVariables.label: Study Day Animal Weighed
datasetVariables.name: BWDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWNOMDY

datasetVariables.description: Nominal study day used for grouping records for observations that may occur on different days into a single reported study day. Should be an integer.
datasetVariables.label: Nominal Study Day for Tabulations
datasetVariables.name: BWNOMDY

parentProduct.title: Standard for Exchange of Nonclinical Data Implementation Guide: Nonclinical Studies Version 3.1 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SENDIG variable BW.BWNOMLBL

datasetVariables.description: A label for a given value of BWNOMDY as presented in the study report. Examples: "Week 4," "Day 28," "Terminal Sac".
datasetVariables.label: Label for Nominal Study Day
datasetVariables.name: BWNOMLBL

description: This domain captures body weights collected for subjects during the study and at the end of the study (terminal body weights). (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, SDOMAIN, C95085, 2018-06-29)
label: Body Weight
name: BW
